Author: Kalash#2884
Content: Maybe I don't understand, but it seems like they would gain double the reward. The cheated reward, and then the reward for finding the valid block.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: remember the entire network is mining the cheating utxo, so your chance of being able to claim it is your percentage of overall hashrate

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: which if repeated would only compound over time

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: how do they gain double the reward if the first reward is lost?

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: the first reward isn't lost if they are able to validate their malicious attempt

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: win a block, then cheat and lose it 95% of the time is the outcome if they have 5% the hashrate

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes they lose the first one, just to regain it via the cheating claim

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: But it allows them to make their cheated claim valid

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: and yes, of course it requires a majority of hashrate

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: but with a small cap coin that's not very difficult

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: do that enough times and they then gain an exponentially increasing claim of stake rewards

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: ok so say they have 100% the hashrate, they lose the first block reward, just to gain it via cheat claim

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: how is that any better than just keeping the first blockreward???

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: do you realize they lose the original blockreward if a cheat claim is made?

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: only if one of their nodes doesn't find it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and that assumes they are the miner 100 blocks later

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but if their node finds it, then either the original blockreward is kept or the cheat claim is not done

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: how is there any gain?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it seems the best that happens is the same as if no cheating was attempted, but the worst is that the cheater doesnt mine the cheat claim and then loses

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so we have net neutral or net negative. there is no positive that I see. maybe you can describe how you plan to make gains with this

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: 1 is 1

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: I see what you mean, but it does seem to be a way to allow a "free" doublespend. I need to read more, but something about this doesn't seem right.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: looking forward to an actual attack scenario. likely would be a VRSC bounty if you can find it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it isnt "free" since to do the cheat claim the original blockreward is spent. how you think that is a double spend, i have no idea

Author: Kalash#2884
Content: I could be wrong, that's why I ask

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: my sense is that you are wrong, but maybe i am wrong, so keep pursuing this

Converting from erc20 to kmd would be possible once we have fungibility between the two.  But as jl says do an airdrop from a db.

Content: But these things are not deal breakers, invite them to test what the need.  https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/create-Komodo-Assetchain.html if they need assistance, just ask here in discord
